## R Markdown



```{r cars}
cafe <- read.csv(file="~/Desktop/cafedados.csv",head=TRUE)
head(cafe)
```

## Including Plots


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mapping = aes(x=cafe$Year, y=cafe$Value)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_segment(mapping = aes(x=cafe$Year, xend=cafe$Year,y=0,yend=cafe$Value))

```

```{r asjndoasnoi}
ggplot(mapping = aes(x=cafe$Value)) +
  geom_bar() 
```
